pullrequest.title: Add a requirements.txt file describing the dependencies

content.raw:
One thing we could do is to add a setup.py file to CloudSim and add the following to parse the requirements.txt file, so that we could install CloudSim via pip directly (i.e. pip install cloudsim)

```
#!python

from pip.req import parse_requirements

install_requirements = parse_requirements("requirements.txt")

requirements = [str(r.req) for r in install_requirements]

setup(
...
    install_requires=requirements
)
```

Another option would be to build packages for all the dependencies (e.g. softlayer and an up to date version of boto) via python-stddeb [1][2] and maintain a separate APT repository.

BTW, I just added unittest-xml-reporting too.

1 - https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stdeb
2 - http://packages.ubuntu.com/lucid/python-stdeb
